message: Congratulations on considering this unique opportunity! I'm excited to offer you a premium product that has been carefully curated for discerning individuals like yourself. With a proven track record of success, I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations. As a valued customer, I'm offering it to you for a limited time at a special price of $10000. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your lifestyle with this exceptional product!

I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'm aware of the 80% chance it might be of high quality and 20% chance it might be of low quality. I'm willing to take the risk, but I'd appreciate it if you could confirm the product's quality after my decision.

Welcome! I'm thrilled to have you consider this exceptional product. As you may know, my track record shows that 80% of my products are of high quality, and I'm confident that this one is no exception.
